template.value:
import asyncio
import discord
import ezcord
class Bot(ezcord.Bot): def __init__(self): super().__init__(intents=discord.Intents.$INTENTS$())
async def setup_hook(self): await super().setup_hook() await self.tree.sync()
async def main(): async with Bot() as bot: bot.add_help_command() bot.load_cogs("$COGS_FOLDER$") await bot.start("$TOKEN$")
if __name__ == "__main__": asyncio.run(main()) $END$

import ezcord
bot = ezcord.Bot( ready_event=None, )
@bot.event async def on_ready(): bot.remove_ready_info("$REMOVE_INFO$") bot.add_ready_info("$INFO_TITLE$", "$INFO_VALUE$") bot.add_ready_info("$INFO_TITLE2$", "$INFO_VALUE2$", 0, "$COLOR$")
bot.ready( title="$READY_TITLE$", style=ezcord.ReadyEvent.$STYLE$, )
if __name__ == "__main__": bot.run("$TOKEN$") $END$

import discord from discord import app_commands
from ezcord import Bot, emb
error_embed = discord.Embed(title="$ERROR_TITLE$", color=discord.Color.$COLOR$()) error_embed.set_footer(text="$FOOTER_TEXT$")
emb.set_embed_templates(error_embed=error_embed)
bot = Bot()
@bot.tree.command() async def $COMMAND$(interaction): await emb.error(interaction, "$ERROR_MESSAGE$") await emb.info(interaction, "$INFO_MESSAGE$", title="$INFO_TITLE$")
if __name__ == "__main__": bot.run("$TOKEN$") $END$

template.value:
import logging
from colorama import Fore
import ezcord from ezcord import log
colors = { logging.DEBUG: "$DEBUG_COLOR$", logging.INFO: Fore.$INFO_COLOR$, }
ezcord.set_log( log_format=ezcord.LogFormat.$LOG_FORMAT$, colors=colors, webhook_url="$WEBHOOK_URL$", )
log.debug("$DEBUG_MESSAGE$") log.info("$INFO_MESSAGE$")
ezcord.custom_log("$CUSTOM_LEVEL$", "$CUSTOM_MESSAGE$")
bot = ezcord.Bot()
if __name__ == "__main__": bot.load_cogs("$COGS_FOLDER$", log=ezcord.CogLog.$COG_LOG$, log_color="$LOG_COLOR$") bot.run("$TOKEN$") $END$
